name: Unmade
description:
Let the Unmaking begin! Unmade is a top-down action/stealth shooter where you play a marine possessed by Chaos itself. Sneak, fight, and possess your way through a sprawling military base and face your former comrades. As the chosen of Chaos, you must unmake everyone and everything in your way, compelled to seek out the scattered Chaos Symbols and reassemble a most unholy artifact.

Controls:

Walk: WASD or Arrows
Shoot: Spacebar
Interact: E (when you see a small white circle appear)
Chaos scout: Hold left shift (in scout mode your shoot becomes a distraction tool)

dojogrant - Audio
RTStump - Narrative
Talluff - Art/Programming
